generated_description: mindscape ketamine & infusion therapy, pllc houston is a medical clinic located in houston, texas that specializes in iv ketamine therapy for severe depression, bipolar depression, anxiety, ptsd, ptsd and chronic pain conditions. they offer virtual reality-based guided meditation to complement iv ketamine infusions in the treatment of these conditions. the clinic is the only one in houston to offer this type of treatment. they also provide treatment for treatment resistant depression (trd) and complex regional pain syndrome (crps). the clinic has received positive reviews from patients who have experienced significant improvements in their physical and mental well-being after receiving treatment.
